TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemBrushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 每個屬性類別是這是 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

span.span: Each property of the class is a that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用鍵盤快速鍵設定屬性。The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the property. 它也會示範如何使用方法。It also demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼入表單中，處理表單的事件，並呼叫下列方法，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's event and call the following method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: A that is the color of the active window's border.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppWorkspace As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ AppWorkspace { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，這是應用程式工作區的色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the application workspace.

value.span: A也就是應用程式工作區的色彩。

span.span: A that is the color of the application workspace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式工作區是不被文件佔領的多重文件檢視中的區域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonHighlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonHighlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得也就是 3d 項目的反白顯示色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

value.span: A也就是 3d 項目的反白顯示色彩。

span.span: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3d 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

span.span: A that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3d 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

span.span: A that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GrayText As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ GrayText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得也就是呈現暗灰色文字的色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of dimmed text.

value.span: A也就是呈現暗灰色文字的色彩。

span.span: A that is the color of dimmed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已停用的項目在清單中會顯示在呈現暗灰色文字。Disabled items in a list are displayed in dimmed text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ Highlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得也就是所選項目的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the background of selected items.

value.span: A也就是所選項目的背景色彩。

span.span: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，筆刷可能用於清單方塊中選取的項目背景的色彩。For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property HighlightText As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ HighlightText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，也就是所選項目的文字色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the text of selected items.

value.span: A也就是所選項目的文字色彩。

span.span: A that is the color of the text of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，筆刷可能用於清單方塊中選取的項目文字的色彩。For example, the brush may be the color used for the text of selected items in a list box.

summary.span: 取得 ，這是用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

span.span: A that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 熱追蹤項目按一下單一執行該項目。Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
